name: SkeletonJoin
_source: speak;Eirika;Ah!|There are still some monsters left!|Be still, fiends!
speak;BoneBoy;Wait a second!|We're not your enemies!
speak;BoneBoy;We can't remember... but we're not your enemies, I know that much.|We have been wandering a long time, searching for... answers.
speak;BoneBoy;Yes...|My friend and I here woke up one day with no memories.|No idea how we got here, or why we're like... Well, this.|So, we've been trying to find all that out...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Does your friend there speak?
speak;Lute;I was right!|I knew I sensed some monsters!
speak;Eirika;Oh, Lute, right?|What are you doing here?

speak;Lute;I know we met but moments ago, but I just had to come.|My magic detected some more monsters, so I just had to investigate!|But you're not fighting, so I suppose...|Something else is going on here?
speak;BoneBoy;Yeah, the lady and I were having a chat.|Not your enemy, neither of us. So...|Uh, drop the book?
speak;Lute;The skeleton just spoke?|Fascinating!|I've never read of a skeleton that can communicate before!
speak;BoneBoy;I've had no trouble with communication, thanks.|Except for the whole thing about looking like a monster...
speak;Lute;I see, I see!|I simply must study you and your friend there.|Eirika, right?|Imagine all the things we can learn from them!
speak;Eirika;I don't know...|This might not be a good idea.|They could be... Spies? Or something?
speak;Lute;Leave them with me, then!|I won't let anything go awry with them..|<red>Were they to fall, I wager I could even revive them!.</>
speak;Eirika;Hmmm....|Are you two alright with that?
speak;BoneBoy;... I mean, she's weird, but...|If she can help us get our memories back, it's worth it.|Not like we have many other options, anyways.
speak;Eirika;Alright...|I'll leave them in your care, Lute.
speak;Lute;Perfect!|This is exciting!|I can't to start researching you.
speak;BoneBoy;I guess we'll follow your orders then, Master Lute!|Here's hoping you can help us find out what we are.
speak;Eirika;Oh, wait!|Last thing, what should we call you two?|I don't feel right, simply saying 'Skeleton'.
speak;BoneBoy;Anything is fine.|Not like we have names to give you as is.
speak;Lute;Ok, now let's hurry up and go!
speak;Eirika;That skeleton's armor...|I could have sworn it was of the knights of Renais.|Is he from Renais?...
speak;Eirika;I think it's too risky...|I'm sorry, but we do wish you the best.
speak;BoneBoy;...That is regrettable, but I understand...|We will take our leave, then.
speak;Lute;Ah...|Such a brilliant oportunity, wasted...|I hope we don't regret that...
